message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Considering its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? It's a fair price considering the value this product offers.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
